title: 1140 true damage from 1 camille q.
body: What do I do against this when I am trapped in her ult? I even built hp and it still did almost 40% of my hp.

replies.body: kill her because her only/main damage ability is now on cooldown

> [{quoted}](name=AFilthyCaitMain,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Iehntct0,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-02-11T06:53:44.013+0000)
>
> kill her because her only/main damage ability is now on cooldown

You do know her Q is on a 4s CD with 0% cdr right?
no. its 6 seconds. and then even with 40% cdr thats 3.5 seconds of her not being able to do any meaningful damage
You can't do anything. Game's busted.

You die.

Welcome to top lane.
